text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ZenBook Pro 15 UX550GE-XB71T 15.6-inch UHD 4K Touch Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750HK, 16GB 2133MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe x4 SSD, Windows 10 Professional, Fingerprint, NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS ZenBook Pro 15 UX550GE-XB71T 15.6-inch UHD 4K Touch Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750HK, 16GB 2133MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe x4 SSD, Windows 10 Professional, Fingerprint, NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS ZenBook Pro 15 UX550GE-XB71T 15.6-inch UHD 4K Touch Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750HK, 16GB 2133MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe x4 SSD, Windows 10 Professional, Fingerprint, NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the ASUS ZenBook Pro 15 UX550GE-XB71T 15.6-inch UHD 4K Touch Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750HK, 16GB 2133MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe x4 SSD, Windows 10 Professional, Fingerprint, NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS ZenBook Pro 15 UX550GE-XB71T 15.6-inch UHD 4K Touch Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750HK, 16GB 2133MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe x4 SSD, Windows 10 Professional, Fingerprint, NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
